title: Finding a brighter future for Tanzania's child domestic workers
description: Mercy Esther was eight years old when she left home.

title: Turkey was devastated by an earthquake. Here's what that means for tourism
description: It was shaping up to be a golden year for tourism in Turkey. With favorable exchange rates sweetening the deal for visitors, the country's beautiful beaches, historic cities and geological wonders were poised for a post-pandemic tourism revival.
